description: This schema represents a generic open question with a unit-value pair answer that needs to be defined (for example, a time duration).

answer.description: Reference the appropriate unit_value schema, if it already exists (for ex., duration-unit-value for time) and, if applicable, subset the unit of measures, or define a unit-value schema as needed.

date_time.description: Create one property for each of the question-level timestamp you need: for ex., start_date_time, end_date_time
